Package it.polimi.ingsw.models

Class LivingRoom

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.Observable<LivingRoom,ViewEvent>
it.polimi.ingsw.models.LivingRoom
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class LivingRoom extends Observable<LivingRoom,ViewEvent> implements Serializable
Represents the living room of the game. It contains Tiles that can be picked up by Players

      public Tile[][] getBoard()

    • needRefill

      public boolean needRefill()
      Returns:
      Whether the board needs to be refilled

    • fillBoard

      public void fillBoard(int numPlayers, List<Tile> remainingTiles)
      Fill the board with new Tiles, accordingly to the number of players.
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - Min 2, Max 4. If wrong throws NumPlayerException on Runtime
      remainingTiles - Will remove tiles from remainingTiles and insert them into the board

    • chooseTiles

      public List<Tile> chooseTiles(List<Coordinates> coordinates) throws PickTilesException
      Removes 1 to 3 Tiles from the board. Picked Tiles must be adjacent to each other, and must have at least a free edge
      Parameters:
      coordinates - Represents the coordinates of the Tiles to pick up
      Returns:
      The list of Tiles that have been removed from the board
      Throws:
      PickTilesException - The picked up Tiles are in invalid positions or invalid number of coordinates

    • fillBoardIfNeeded

      public boolean fillBoardIfNeeded(int numPlayers, List<Tile> remainingTiles)
      Fills the board with new Tiles if needed, accordingly to the number of players.
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - The number of players in the game
      remainingTiles - The set of Tiles that can be placed on the board
      Returns:
      Whether the board has been refilled or not

    • removeTiles

      public void removeTiles(List<Coordinates> coordinates) throws PickTilesException
      Removes tiles from the board
      Parameters:
      coordinates -
      Throws:
      PickTilesException - if a chosen tile has been already removed (is null)
